net.sourceforge.taglets.impl
Class CoreConfiguration

java.lang.Object
  net.sourceforge.taglets.impl.CoreConfiguration

public final class CoreConfiguration
extends Object

Single access point to read the core configuration of the taglets.

Creates a Properties object from the specified input stream.

Parameters:

resolver - the import resolver to use if there are import statements in the properties object created.
Returns:
the Properties created or null if the input stream passed in was null or there was an IOException while reading the properties object.

getCoreConfiguration

public static final Configuration getCoreConfiguration()
Returns the core configuration of the taglets.

Note:

This configuration includes the following configurations in the given order of precedence:

  1. System properties starting with TAGLETS_PREFIX.
  2. Properties read from file denoted by the system property TAGLETS_CONFIGURATION_FILE.
  3. Properties read from the classpath file TAGLETS_USER_CONFIGURATION.
  4. Properties read form the default configuration file in the classpath TAGLETS_DEFAULT_CONFIGURATION_FILE (unless the default configuration has been disabled using the system property TAGLETS_NO_DEFAULT_CONFIGURATION).

Returns:
the core taglets configuration, never null.
Since:
1.3.0
